com.sqlmagic.tinysql
Class dbfFileTable

java.lang.Object
  com.sqlmagic.tinysql.tinySQLTable
      com.sqlmagic.tinysql.dbfFileTable

public class dbfFileTable
extends tinySQLTable

dBase read/write access

Author:
Brian Jepson , Marcel Ruff Added write access to dBase and JDK 2 support, Thomas Morgner Added caching for the current read row. A row is now read only once and substrings are generated by each call to GetCol. Incredibly increased read speed when little memory is available and disks are slow.
